experienceTimeline.shortDescription: Development of the company's public-facing website using Next.js.
experienceTimeline.longDescription: Actively involved in building and maintaining the Sofomo company website. The project focused on delivering a performant, modern front-end using Next.js, with attention to SEO, responsiveness, and maintainability in a production environment.

experienceTimeline.shortDescription: Automated testing of an internal Salesforce-based application using Selenium.
experienceTimeline.longDescription: Worked as a QA Engineer on an internal Salesforce-based application. The project focused on automated testing using Selenium, CI setup with Jenkins, and maintaining QA workflows. Also contributed to a small internal Next.js application supporting QA and testing processes.

experienceTimeline.shortDescription: Lead front-end development of an internal Vue application integrated with NetSuite CRM.
experienceTimeline.longDescription: Led front-end development of an internal Vue-based application integrated with NetSuite CRM for a medical services company. The application extended NetSuite functionality through a custom user interface and supported internal business workflows.

experienceTimeline.shortDescription: Development of internal React and Vue front-end modules integrated with NetSuite.
experienceTimeline.longDescription: Working on a long-term internal project focused on building external front-end modules using React and Vue, integrated and hosted within NetSuite. The work involves extending existing NetSuite functionality, coordinating front-end code with SuiteScript, and implementing automated UI testing.

experienceTimeline.shortDescription: Migration of a public-facing e-commerce website to React using Hydrogen and Remix.
experienceTimeline.longDescription: Participated in the migration of a public-facing e-commerce website from Angular to a modern React-based stack using Shopify Hydrogen and Remix. The project included Shopify API integration and translation of Liquid templates into React components within a headless commerce architecture.

experienceTimeline.shortDescription: Lead front-end development of a Next.js-based learning platform user interface.
experienceTimeline.longDescription: One of the lead front-end developers responsible for building and maintaining the user interface of an English language learning platform. The work focused on scalable UI architecture, performance optimization, and delivering a consistent user experience using Next.js.

experienceTimeline.shortDescription: Personal portfolio website showcasing projects and skills with modern animations.
experienceTimeline.longDescription: A personal portfolio website built from scratch using Next.js, TypeScript, and Framer Motion. Features include animated orbital tech icons, interactive timeline, smooth scroll animations, and a responsive design with a custom color scheme.

experienceTimeline.shortDescription: A new personal project currently in development. Details coming soon.
experienceTimeline.longDescription: This is a placeholder for an upcoming personal project. Replace this with your actual project details when ready.

about.intro: Front-end Developer with 4+ years of commercial experience, specializing in React, TypeScript, and Next.js. Working primarily on e-commerce platforms and enterprise integrations for international clients.

previousCareer.title: 12+ Years in Hospitality Management
previousCareer.description: Before transitioning to tech, I built a successful career in the hotel industry spanning over 12 years. I held senior management positions where I was responsible for leading teams, managing operations, and delivering exceptional guest experiences at international properties.
highlights: Managed teams of 20+ staff members across multiple departments
Responsible for budgets, KPIs, and operational excellence
Developed strong leadership, communication, and problem-solving skills
Worked with diverse international teams and clientele

journey.title: My Transition into Tech
journey.description: After 12+ years of building a successful career in hospitality management, I discovered my passion for coding and made a deliberate career change. The analytical thinking, problem-solving abilities, and people skills I developed as a manager translate directly into my work as a developer. What started as curiosity turned into a full commitment to mastering modern web technologies.
highlights: Leveraged management experience to excel in collaborative development teams
Made a career transition through intensive self-study and coding bootcamps
Quickly progressed from fundamentals to advanced frameworks
Now working with international clients on enterprise-level projects

education.title: University Education
education.description: Background in a field that developed analytical thinking and problem-solving skills

education.title: Front-end Development Bootcamp
education.description: Intensive training in modern front-end technologies including React, JavaScript, and responsive design

values.title: Clean Code
values.description: Writing maintainable, readable code that stands the test of time

values.title: Continuous Learning
values.description: Staying current with evolving technologies and best practices

values.title: User-Centric Design
values.description: Building interfaces that prioritize user experience and accessibility

funFacts.title: Skiing Enthusiast
funFacts.description: Hitting the slopes whenever I can. There's nothing like the thrill of carving through fresh powder in the mountains.

funFacts.title: Stand-Up Paddleboarding
funFacts.description: Finding balance both on the water and in code. SUP is my way to disconnect and recharge during summer.

funFacts.title: Avid Reader
funFacts.description: Always with a book in hand. From tech literature to fiction, reading expands my perspective and fuels creativity.

funFacts.title: Coffee Connoisseur
funFacts.description: Debugging is powered by quality coffee. Exploring different roasts and brewing methods is a daily ritual.
